Create window and loading shader files. You can create only one window, the current window is overwritten. More...

 Hides the mouse cursor.
bool getShowMouseCursor ()
 getMethode: Hides mouse cursor

Detailed Description

Create window and loading shader files. You can create only one window, the current window is overwritten.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

F2C::Window::Window ( std::string  title,
uint  width,
uint  height,
int  bits,
bool  fullscreen 
)

Creates the window and calls InitGL().

Parameters:
title Window Title
width Width of the window and the resolution.
height Height of the window and the resolution.
bits Color depth (8,12,16,24 or 32)
fullscreen In full-screen Start On / Off.
